timeline.bodyText: What else is useful? SDK/IPC version?
timeline.author: jbutler
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,27 @@
+---
+name: "\U0001F41B Bug Report"
+about: Create a report to help us improve
+title: "(module name): short issue description"
+labels: bug, needs-triage
+---
+
+**Describe the bug**
+A clear and concise description of what the bug is.
+
+**To Reproduce**
+Steps to reproduce the behavior. If possible, provide a minimal amount of code that causes the bug.
+
+**Expected behavior**
+A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.
+
+**Actual behavior**
+Tell us what actually happened.
+
+**Environment**
+ - OS: [e.g. iOS]
+ - Java version:
+ - Nucleus version:

timeline.bodyText: switch this to something more reasonable.
timeline.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: lol, good catch.. inherited from standard github template...
